articles.author: Andrew Solender
articles.title: "Our prime minister": Republicans embrace Elon Musk's role in Trumpworld - Axios
articles.description: One House Republican said "many of us" spoke with the tech billionaire "a couple times this week."
articles.content:
Republican members of Congress took to the Sunday shows to praise Trump lieutenant Elon Musk's involvement in last week's government funding saga, with one likening him to "our prime minister."
Why … [+2198 chars]
